text: Carpophilus is a genus of sap beetles. They are agricultural pests that cause feeding damage to a variety of fruits worldwide. The genus contains a great number of species. Carpophilus melanopterus ==Selected Species== == See also == * Urophorus humeralis (Fabricius, 1798); formerly placed in the genus Carpophilus, this species can be differentiated by having three abdominal tergites rather than two. == References == Category:Nitidulidae Category:Beetles described in 1830
title: Carpophilus
